example.text: Our veterans have risked their lives & made enormous sacrifices for our families & freedoms. But 165K+ WA vets could have their health care stripped away by House Republicans’ disastrous Default on America Act. Here’s what Rebecca, a retired Navy vet from Bothell had to say: [[url]]

The affordable housing shortage is making it increasingly difficult for families to find a safe place to call home. That’s why I introduced bipartisan legislation today with [[user]] [[user]] & [[user]] to create 64K more affordable homes in WA & 2M nationwide. [[url]]

They include the Inflation Reduction Act , which is lowering health care and energy costs for millions of families while also addressing climate change, and the CHIPS and Sciences Act which will create good-paying jobs and lower prices for Washington families. I was also able to secure over $7 million in federal investments to support projects in communities across WA-01.

Without a national data privacy law, millions of Americans' sensitive information is at risk. That's why I'm working to pass a strong federal data privacy law that ensures you have control over your personal data & holds companies responsible for privacy violations.

Standing With Ukraine This week also marked one year since Putin launched an unprovoked war on Ukraine. Since the invasion began, the US has provided critical military, economic, and humanitarian aid to Ukraine, and our region has opened its doors to Ukrainian families and children fleeing the violence.

Without a national data privacy law, millions of Americans' sensitive information is at risk. That's why I'm working to pass a strong federal data privacy law that ensures you have control over your personal data & holds companies responsible for privacy violations.
